sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { get_admin_order } from '../../store/Reducers/orderReducer'; const OrderDetails = () => { const { orderId } = useParams() const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(get_admin_order(orderId)) },[orderId]) const { order } = useSelector(state => state.order) return (

Order Details

#{order._id}

{order.date}

Deliver To : {order.shippingInfo?.name}

{order.shippingInfo?.address} {order.shippingInfo?.province} {order.shippingInfo?.city} {order.shippingInfo?.area}

Payment Status:

{order.payment_status}
Price : ${order.price}
{ order.products && order.products.map((p, i) =>

{p.name}

Brand : {p.brand} Quantity : {p.quantity}

) }

Seller 1 Order :

pending

Product Name here

Brand : Easy Quantity : 3

Seller 1 Order :

pending

Product Name here

Brand : Easy Quantity : 3

); }; export default OrderDetails;
